      Methods in org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.data that return DataPort 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract DataPort DataPortImpl.clone() 
      DataPort DataPort.clone() 
      DataPort DataPortImpl.getCollectionPositionProvider() 
      DataPort DataPort.getCollectionPositionProvider()
      The collection position is used for input as well as output ports.
      For input ports it provides the position that is to be used to extract a single data item from a source port that returns a data collection.
      For output ports it specifies the position where to put a single data item that is returned from a forwarded port and the output port is a data collection.
      DataPort InputPortImpl.getSource() 
      DataPort InputPort.getSource()
      The source of the input port (usually an output port of another activity)
      Methods in org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.data with parameters of type DataPort 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DataPortImpl.setCollectionPositionProvider(DataPort port) 
      void DataPort.setCollectionPositionProvider(DataPort port)
      The collection position is used for input as well as output ports.
      For input ports it provides the position that is to be used to extract a single data item from a source port that returns a data collection.
      For output ports it specifies the position where to put a single data item that is returned from a forwarded port and the output port is a data collection.
      void InputPortImpl.setSource(DataPort source)
